name: ai-desktop-assistant
author: Trae User <user@example.com>
description: An AI Desktop Assistant built with Electron, React and SQLite

scripts.build:local:mac: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'rm -rf dist && node scripts/bump-version.js && electron-vite build && electron-builder --publish never --mac'
scripts.build:local:mac:notarize: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'rm -rf dist && node scripts/bump-version.js && electron-vite build && electron-builder --publish never --mac && node scripts/notarize-app.js'
scripts.build:local:win: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'rm -rf dist && node scripts/bump-version.js && electron-vite build && ELECTRON_BUILDER_SKIP_DEPENDENCY_INSTALL=1 electron-builder --publish never --win --x64'
scripts.build:local:linux: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'rm -rf dist && node scripts/bump-version.js && electron-vite build && ELECTRON_BUILDER_SKIP_DEPENDENCY_INSTALL=1 electron-builder --publish never --linux --arm64'
scripts.build:local:all: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'rm -rf dist && node scripts/bump-version.js && electron-vite build && electron-builder --publish never --mac --win --linux'
scripts.build:remote:mac: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'rm -rf dist && node scripts/bump-version.js && electron-vite build && ELECTRON_BUILDER_SKIP_DEPENDENCY_INSTALL=1 electron-builder --publish always --mac --arm64'
scripts.build:remote:mac:notarize: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'rm -rf dist && node scripts/bump-version.js && electron-vite build && ELECTRON_BUILDER_SKIP_DEPENDENCY_INSTALL=1 electron-builder --publish always --mac --arm64 && node scripts/notarize-app.js'
scripts.build:remote:win: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'rm -rf dist && node scripts/bump-version.js && electron-vite build && ELECTRON_BUILDER_SKIP_DEPENDENCY_INSTALL=1 electron-builder --publish always --win --x64'
scripts.build:remote:linux: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'rm -rf dist && node scripts/bump-version.js && electron-vite build && ELECTRON_BUILDER_SKIP_DEPENDENCY_INSTALL=1 electron-builder --publish always --linux --arm64'
scripts.build:remote:all: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'rm -rf dist && node scripts/bump-version.js && electron-vite build && electron-builder --publish always --mac --win --linux'
